title: Howler Radio
blurb
A student-led webradio broadcasting from the desert.
End of Semester Show
blurb
Each Fall and Spring, we organize a show to exhibit the projects made by students in our classes.
24X
blurb
A full day of innovative creation and artistic experimentation during which pairs of students collaborate -for the sake of collaborating.
Crit Group
blurb
Come get feedback, learn how to give feedback, improve everything from your homework to your life.
VR Studio
blurb
A full-fledged VR Studio equipped with networked HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Google Daydream.
SIGs
blurb
Some of the SIGs (Students Interest Group) involved with IM are DiscoVR, Blockchain SIG, weSTEM and PAUSED.
Open Studios
blurb
We participate heavily in the Arts Center Open Studios event, showcasing student, instructor and faculty work across campus.
